Name: Frequency of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ sent before \SW-Reviewer Agreed\
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of manuscripts that received a \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ and led to \SW-Reviewer Agreed\
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Number of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ followed by \SW-Reviewer Declined\
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' occurs

Name: Percentage of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ out of all reminder activities
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all cases where 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' does not happen

Name: Frequency of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ in the most common variant paths
Percentage of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ that precede \Assign a Different Editor\
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Number of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ sent per manuscript
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' activities grouped by the last value of code

Name: Percentage of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ followed by \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2\
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Frequency of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ in relation to total activities in the review process
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all cases

Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Number of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ in manuscripts that were accepted (\RW-EIC Accept\)
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' activities for cases where activity 'RW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ in manuscripts that were rejected (\SW-EIC Reject\)
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-EIC Reject'

Name: Frequency of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ in relation to \SW-AE Assign Reviewers\
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs
